query.description: String representing the name assigned to the caller ID. Will return all Verified Caller IDs containing this value as a substring.
String representing the number assigned to the caller ID. Will return all Verified Caller IDs containing this value as a substring.
The name given to the brand. Will return all Brands containing this value as a substring.
The state of the brand in the registration process, such as pending or complete. Will return all Brands with this value.

request.description: Returns a list of your Brands. The brands are returned sorted by creation date, with the most recent appearing first. The list is filterable by sending in any of the following parameters.

urlencoded.description: A name for the brand.
Full company name and DBA if applicable.
A company contact email for this brand.
A contact phone number for this brand.
Country of registration.
What type of legal entity is the organization? (PRIVATE_PROFIT, PUBLIC_PROFIT, NON_PROFIT)
Company EIN Number/Tax ID
Full company address.

An optional Vertical for the brand (REAL_ESTATE, HEALTHCARE, ENERGY, ENTERTAINMENT, RETAIL, AGRICULTURE, INSURANCE, EDUCATION, HOSPITALITY, FINANCIAL, GAMBLING, CONSTRUCTION, NGO, MANUFACTURING, GOVERNMENT, TECHNOLOGY, COMMUNICATION).
Link to the company website.
If you are your own Campaign Service Provider, this is the approved Brand ID (Mandatory for CSPs, otherwise please omit)
This value must be true for all self-registered brands.
The name for the campaign

An SMS Use Case category for the campaign (2FA, ACCOUNT_NOTIFICATION, AGENTS_FRANCHISES, CARRIER_EXEMPT, CHARITY, CONVERSATIONAL, CUSTOMER_CARE, DELIVERY_NOTIFICATION, EMERGENCY, FRAUD_ALERT, HIGHER_EDUCATION, LOW_VOLUME_MIXED, MARKETING, MIXED, POLITICAL, POLLING_VOTING, PUBLIC_SERVICE_ANNOUNCEMENT, SECURITY_ALERT, SOCIAL, SWEEPSTAKE, TRIAL).

A sub use case category for MIXED or LOW_VOLUME_MIXED campaigns (CUSTOMER_CARE, HIGHER_EDUCATION, POLLING_VOTING, PUBLIC_SERVICE_ANNOUNCEMENT, MARKETING, SECURITY_ALERT, 2FA, ACCOUNT_NOTIFICATION, DELIVERY_NOTIFICATION, FRAUD_ALERT).

urlencoded.value: This is a long campaign description to meet new minimum character requirements
urlencoded.description: A description for the campaign.
Sample message template/content. At least one sample is required and up to five can be provided.
Sample 2.
Sample 3.
Sample 4.
Sample 5.
If your messaging content will be modified in any way beyond what you shared in your templates, please describe the nature of how the content will change.
Please provide a description of how users provide their number to you and how they consent to receiving SMS messages.

urlencoded.value: This is an example of what an opt out message could be
urlencoded.description: Opt-out process description, or a URL to view the opt out process.
Will 50 or more numbers be used with this single campaign? Answer true or false.

urlencoded.value: Each rep must have their own phone number
urlencoded.description: If number pooling will be used, please provide an explanation as to why it is needed.
Will this campaign include content related to direct lending or other loan agreements?
Will you be using an embedded link of any kind? Note that public URL shorteners (bitly, tinyurl) will not be accepted.
Are you using an embedded phone number (except the required HELP information contact phone number)?
I agree to the terms and conditions that I will not use this campaign for affiliate marketing.
Will this campaign include any age gated content as defined by carrier and CTA guidelines?
If you are your own Campaign Service Provider, what is the approved Campaign ID? (Mandatory for CSPs, otherwise please omit)

urlencoded.value: some sort of message descriping how users get help
this is a long call to action of what your customer should experience

urlencoded.description: A name for the campaign.

item.name: List All Phone Number Assignments (on a campaign)

query.description: The state of the assignments in the registration process, such as pending or complete. Will return all assignments with this value.

item.name: List All Phone Number Assignment Orders

query.description: The state of the orders in the registration process, such as pending or processed. Will return all orders with this value.

Retrieve a Phone Number Assignment Order

query.description: String representing the domain portion of the domain application. Will return all domain applications containing this value as a substring
String representing the name portion of the domain application. Will return all domain applications containing this value as a substring.
The name given to the phone number. Will return all Phone Numbers containing this value as a substring.
The phone number in E164 format. Will return all Phone Numbers containing this value as a substring.
An area code to search within
search for local or toll-free, default local
A string of 3 to 7 digits that should be used as the start of a number. Cannot be used in combination with contains or ends_with.
A string of 3 to 7 digits that should appear somewhere in the number. Cannot be used in combination with starts_with or ends_with.
A string of 3 to 7 digits that should be used as the end of a number. Cannot be used in combination with starts_with or contains.
The maximum number of matches to return. Upper limit of 100. Defaults to 50.
A region or state to search within. Must be an ISO 3166-2 alpha-2 code, i.e. TX for Texas. Cannot be used in combination with areacode.
A specific City to search within. Must be used in combination with region. Cannot be used in combination with areacode, starts_with, contains, or ends_with.
live lookup for carrier details, only valid for numbers with +1 country code
live lookup for caller ID details, only valid for numbers with a +1 country code
looks up both cnam and carrier
String representing the username portion of the endpoint. Will return all SIP Endpoints containing this value as a substring.
Friendly Caller ID used as the CNAM when dialing a phone number or the From when dialing another SIP Endpoint. Will return all SIP Endpoints containing this value as a substring.

urlencoded.description: A named unique identifier for the room. Allowed characters: A-Za-z0-9_-. Maximum of 100 characters.
Display name of the room. Maximum of 200 characters. Defaults to the value of name.
The maximum number of members in the room at a time. Must be at least one to a maximum of 300. Defaults to 20.
The room's resolution. Allowed values are 720p or 1080p. Defaults to 720p.
Room does not accept new participants before this time. Overridable by token.
Room stops accepting new participants at this time, but keeps running until all participants leave. Overridable by token.
Remove users from the room at this time. Overridable by token.
Remove users after they are in the room for N seconds. Overridable by token.
The room's initial layout. Defaults to grid-responsive. See documentation for a full list of supported layouts.
Specifies whether to start recording a Room Session when one is started for this Room
Whether a video with a preview of the content of the room is to be generated.

item.name: Find a Room by Unique Name

urlencoded.description: Display name of the room. Maximum of 200 characters. Defaults to the value of name.
The maximum number of members in the room at a time. Must be at least one to a maximum of 300. Defaults to 20.
The room's resolution. Allowed values are 720p or 1080p. Defaults to 720p.
Room does not accept new participants before this time. Overridable by token.
Room stops accepting new participants at this time, but keeps running until all participants leave. Overridable by token.
Remove users from the room at this time. Overridable by token.
Remove users after they are in the room for N seconds. Overridable by token.
The room's initial layout. Defaults to grid-responsive. See documentation for a full list of supported layouts.
Specifies whether to start recording a Room Session when one is started for this Room
Whether a video with a preview of the content of the room is to be generated.

item.name: Find a Room Session by ID

query.description: Generated media links will be valid for this many seconds. Default is 900 (15 minutes).

item.name: Generate a New Video Room Token

urlencoded.description: REQUIRED, Room's unique named identifier. Allowed characters: A-Za-z0-9_-. Up to 100 characters. The room does not have to exist when the token is created, but must exist prior to joining, or ensure auto_create_room is set to true.
REQUIRED, A display name to use for the user. Up to 100 characters.
A list of permissions (array of strings), which define what user can do once they join the room.
The user can't join the room before this time.
The user can't join the room after this time.
Remove user from the room at this time.
Remove user after they are in the room for N seconds.
Whether the user joins the room with their audio muted.
Whether the user joins the room with their video muted.
If user tries to join a room and this room doesn't exist, it will be created with default configuration if this parameter is set to true.
Whether to generate a video with a preview of the content of the room. This parameter has effect only if this token auto-creates the room, thus it will be ignored if the room already exists.
Display name used if a room is auto-created when the token joins. Maximum of 200 characters. Defaults to the value of room_name.

query.description: Generated media links will be valid for this many seconds. Default is 900 (15 minutes).
